Parameters.Name: jqj_JobTimeout
Parameters.Label: Timeout Duration(secs)
Parameters.HelpText: e.g. 60. Specify in secs how long to check for the job status before timing out.

Parameters.Name: jqj_JenkinsUserName
Parameters.Label: Jenkins User Name
Parameters.HelpText: (Optional) User name  to use to connect to the Jenkins Server

Parameters.Name: jqj_JenkinsUserPasword
Parameters.Label: Jenkins User Password
Parameters.HelpText: (Optional) The password to use to connect to the Jenkins Server

Parameters.Name: jqj_checkInterval
Parameters.Label: Check Interval
Parameters.HelpText: The sleep time between checking if the job is running in seconds
